import { useState } from 'react'; const increaseHandler = ({pages,setPages}) => { let arr = [] for (let i in pages) { console.log(arr) arr.push(parseInt(pages[i]) + 1) } console.log(arr) setPages(arr) } const decreaseHandler = ({pages,setPages}) => { let arr = [] for (let i in pages) { console.log(arr) arr.push(parseInt(pages[i]) - 1) } console.log(arr) setPages(arr) } const Pagination = ({clickHandler,page}) => { const [pages, setPages] = useState([1, 2, 3, 4, 5]); return (
  • decreaseHandler(pages,setPages())}>-
  • clickHandler(pages[0])}>{pages[0]}
  • clickHandler(pages[1])}>{pages[1]}
  • clickHandler(pages[2])}>{pages[2]}
  • clickHandler(pages[3])}>{pages[3]}
  • clickHandler(pages[4])}>{pages[4]}
  • increaseHandler(pages,setPages)}>+
) } export default Pagination
